title: Abenobashi Mahou☆Shoutengai (Magical☆Shopping Arcade Abenobashi)
synopsis: Satoshi "Sasshi" Imamiya believes his life is in shambles, as only a 12-year-old can. Having lost his card collection, his childish dilemmas worsen when he learns that his childhood friend, Arumi Asahina, will be moving away.
voices: ['Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Saeki, Tomo', 'Hisakawa, Aya', 'Koyama, Rikiya', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Okamura, Akemi', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Noda, Junko', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Ishii, Kouji']
